title: Seattle Orcas Team MLC 2024 Squad, Players list, Captain, Coach | SO Squads Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024
body:
Seattle Orcas MLC T20 2024 Squad, Players list, Captain, Coach | Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024 Squads, Owners | Seattle Orcas (SO) Administration and support staff

Seattle Orcas Team MLC 2024 Squad, Players list, Captain - The Seattle Orcas team also know as (SO Team 2024, Seattle Orcas MLC 2024 Team) is a Twenty20 franchise cricket team plays in the Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024. The SO franchise team is based in Seattle, Washington, United States.

Seattle Orcas team is owned by GMR Group, Satya Nadella. The SO team will be captained by Wayne Parnell and coached by Pravin Amre.

Major League Cricket (MLC) (also known as MLC 2024, MLC 2024 USA T20) is an the top-level professional Twenty20 cricket league Tournament in United States, organized by the American Cricket Enterprises (ACE).

We are shared Seattle Orcas 2024 Squad, Players list, Captain for the Major League Cricket season..

summary:
**Tournament Overview:**
The article is about the Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024, a top-level professional Twenty20 cricket league tournament in the United States, organized by the American Cricket Enterprises (ACE).

**Team Overview:**
The article focuses on the Seattle Orcas team, a Twenty20 franchise cricket team based in Seattle, Washington, United States. The team is owned by GMR Group and Satya Nadella.

**Team Details:**

* Captain: Wayne Parnell
* Coach: Pravin Amre
* Squad: 15 players, including Quinton de Kock, Heinrich Klaasen, and Imad Wasim
* Home ground: Marymoor Cricket Community Park, Redmond, Washington, with a capacity of 6,000

**Support Staff:**

* Head Coach: Pravin Amre
* Batting coach: Ross Taylor
* Bowling coach: Johan Botha
